sections.body: This Act may be called the Privy Purses (Charged Expenditure) Act, 1968.

sections.section_title: Expenditure on privy purse to be charged expenditure
sections.body: Where, under any agreement for the time being in force between the Federal Government and the Ruler of a former State which at any time was in accession with Pakistan or his successor, any sum is payable as privy purse by the Federal Government, such sum shall be charged on the Federal Consolidated Fund and be paid out of that Fund and shall be deemed always to have been so charged and paid.
